import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Col, Row, ListGroup, Image, Form, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Message from '../components/Message' import { addToCart } from '../redux/actions/cartActions' const CartScreen = ({ match, location, history }) => { const productID = match.params.id const qty = location.search ? Number(location.search.split('=')[1]) : 1 return
Cart
} export default CartScreen
